Architecture¶

JamDB as a Backend¶

Experimenter’s backend is driven by JamDB, which provides a performant API over a document store. It offers JSON Schema validation of submitted documents and a versioned history of all documents. This goal of this section of the documentation is to give a breif overview of the JamDB API in its relation to Experimenter.

For now, the best resource on learning more about this is reading the code here as well as the JamDB documentation.
